ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
State-of-the-art time series forecasting for PyTorch.

`NeuralForecast` is a Python library for time series forecasting with
deep learning models. It includes *benchmark datasets*, *data-loading
utilities*, *evaluation functions*, statistical *tests*, univariate *model
benchmarks* and *SOTA* models implemented in PyTorch and PyTorchLightning.

PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/neuralforecast/](https://pypi.org/project/neuralforecast/)
about.summary: Deep Learning for Time Series Forecasting

about.description:
State-of-the-art time series forecasting for PyTorch.

`NeuralForecast` is a Python library for time series forecasting with
deep learning models. It includes *benchmark datasets*, *data-loading
utilities*, *evaluation functions*, statistical *tests*, univariate *model
benchmarks* and *SOTA* models implemented in PyTorch and PyTorchLightning.

PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/neuralforecast/](https://pypi.org/project/neuralforecast/)
about.summary: Deep Learning for Time Series Forecasting

name: neuralforecast
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "neuralforecast" %}
{% set version = "3.1.4" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/neuralforecast-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 529d3723cef9d737e07857754b74752661eb81b76a99bc43b3b0e838ee5ec563

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - coreforecast >=0.0.7
    - fsspec
    - numpy >=1.21.6
    - optuna
    - pandas >=1.3.5
    - pytorch >=2.0.0
    - pytorch-lightning >=2.0.0
    - ray-tune >=2.2.0
    - utilsforecast >=0.2.3
    - scipy

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - neuralforecast
  ## Skipping pip-check (as build keeps failing)
  # commands:
  #   - pip check
  # requires:
  #   - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/Nixtla/neuralforecast/tree/main/
  summary: Deep Learning for Time Series Forecasting
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  license_family: APACHE
  description: |
    State-of-the-art time series forecasting for PyTorch.

    `NeuralForecast` is a Python library for time series forecasting with 
    deep learning models. It includes *benchmark datasets*, *data-loading 
    utilities*, *evaluation functions*, statistical *tests*, univariate *model 
    benchmarks* and *SOTA* models implemented in PyTorch and PyTorchLightning.

    PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/neuralforecast/](https://pypi.org/project/neuralforecast/)

  doc_url: https://nixtlaverse.nixtla.io/neuralforecast/docs/getting-started/introduction.html
  dev_url: https://github.com/Nixtla/neuralforecast/tree/main/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - sugatoray
    - cchallu
    - AzulGarza
    - jmoralez
    - mergenthaler
    - marcopeix
    - elephaint
    - JQGoh
    - nasaul
    - goodwanghan
    - ngupta23
    - MMenchero
